name: A Long Way Home Demo
description:
A Boy got lost in Lost land, and he is trying to back home

you will live in the dark, in pain, and on lonely trips with him,

discover new places in lost land, creepy things, and a scary atmosphere.

Your purpose in getting back home alive.

A Long Way Home is still in a development state by one developer(it's me). Please consider giving me your feedback to help me improve the game! :)

Thank you❤

TheLegend

Follow me on Twitter: @TheLegend_Dev

Some credits are in the game and will be here too.
